pointcloud module¶

class pointcloud.pointcloud(points)¶

Bases: object

Point Cloud database

filter(radius, angle)¶

Filter ot the points in two types according to threshold algorithm

Parameters

  • radius (float) – Searched radius in meters

  • angle (float) – Treshold angle in degrees

Returns

Two lists of points ground and objects

Return type

list,list
